findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability (Staking.sol)
findings.description: Do not update a state variable after a transfer call.

findings.title: Reentrancy in BitBookStake.withdraw
findings.description: Reentrancy vulnerability due to external call safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) and state variable userDetails being written after the call.

findings.title: Reentrancy in BitBookStake.deposit
findings.description: Do not update a state variable after a transfer call.
